title: Ionic compound solubility in water is favored by

content.prompt:
High solubility of an ionic solid in water is favored by which of the following conditions?

  1. The existence of strong ionic attractions in the crystal lattice

  2. The formation of strong ion-dipole attractions

  3. An increase in entropy upon dissolving

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
